seo.title: Corniglia Apartments 2025 | Vacation Rentals Cinque Terre
seo.description: Rent vacation apartments in Corniglia. Self-catering accommodation with terraces, sea views, and authentic village living experience.

body.title: Apartments in Corniglia
body.subtitle: Self-catering apartments for independent travelers. Experience authentic village life with your own space.

features.title: Authentic Living
features.description: Live like a local in historic village buildings. Experience daily life in Corniglia's quietest village.

features.title: Private Terraces
features.description: Many apartments feature terraces with vineyard or sea views. Perfect for morning coffee or evening wine.

features.title: Full Kitchens
features.description: Cook with local ingredients from village shops. Save money and create Italian meals at home.

features.title: Perfect for Families
features.description: More space and flexibility than hotel rooms. Multiple bedrooms and living areas.

features.title: Better Value
features.description: Often more affordable than hotels for longer stays. Weekly discounts commonly available.

features.title: Peaceful Location
features.description: Corniglia's quiet atmosphere perfect for relaxing stays. Fewer tourists, more tranquility.
